column4: its supposed to be an OS that is completely compatible with windows
no such working thing exists by now though
i was reading it, they had it up and running a few basic apps on older hardware
yeah a few basic apps. I don't remember the name. it's been there for several years. still doesn't work with 99.9 of all programs
i might actually try it on my laptop to see how it goes
it's a good idea. but in 5 years or more most things still don't work
I will. gave it 5 years so far ;)
looks to me another microsoft in fostering trying to leech off the public
they used to say it was open source
well right now its still open source, but they are making a corperation out of it
that's often how things turn out. sadly
however i do predict that that company will have some legal battles with microsoft, it'll be sco all over again
